summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 1, Cove Addition to Seattle, being the alley between Queen Anne Avenue and 1st Avenue North, from Boston Street to McGraw Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 13045 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
